H0.text: In which musical would you hear the song Have Yourself a Merry Little Christmas. White Christmas

H1.text: In which musical would you hear the song Have Yourself a Merry Little Christmas. Holiday Inn

H2.text: In which musical would you hear the song Have Yourself a Merry Little Christmas. Elf

H3.text: In which musical would you hear the song Have Yourself a Merry Little Christmas. Meet Me In St Louis

A4.text: It was written in 1943 for the 1944 MGM musical Meet Me in St. Louis.
